participant_1.background:
I've been watching a lot of tv since I quit my job.
there i m a general of an orcish army.
I neglect my health for the sake of my job.
I live in a quiet neighborhood with my dog.
I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters.

participant_2.background:
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
we live in a rural area.
I created a new car design in my head.

content.text: I'm doing good, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks. I've been watching a lot of TV lately. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go running and bake cakes. I also love to explore new places with my family.
That sounds really fun. I've always wanted to go running, but I've never really gotten into it. I love to bake cakes too, but I don't do it as often as I'd like.
It's never too late to start running! And baking cakes is always fun. I love making new recipes and trying new flavors.
I know, I know. I've been meaning to start running for a while now. Maybe I'll start tomorrow.
That's great! Let me know how it goes. I'm sure you'll do great.
So, what are some of your favorite TV shows?
I really like watching fantasy and sci-fi shows. I'm a big fan of Game of Thrones and The Expanse.
Oh, I love those shows too! I'm also a big fan of The Walking Dead and Stranger Things.
Those are both great shows too! I'm really excited for the new season of Stranger Things.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for months.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. It was nice talking to you.
You too! It was nice meeting you
